overview: “Prior to joining MOG, Alex worked at MTV Networks since 1999. Most recently, Alex ran West Coast sales operations for MTV’s Digital platforms including website, wireless, and virtual environments. At MTV, Alex consistently over-delivered on all sales goals thanks to deals with industry leaders such as Microsoft and T-Mobile. He was responsible for over $20 million in digital revenue on the west coast for the MTV brand alone. Alex is a graduate of University of Vermont School of Business.” (Source: MOG)
